body.name: Thermalright Frozen Notte 240 Black ARGB Water Cooling CPU Cooler, 240 Black CPU Cooler Specifications, Double PWM Fans, S-FDB V2 Bearings, Suitable for AMD/AM4 AM5,Intel LGA 1700/1150/1151/1200/2011
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 1 hr 7 mins
features: 【Better cooling】 Water block with full copper mirror plane base + 240 specification black aluminum fin cold plate + high polymer woven protective water pipe + standard 120mm ARGB fan to create low resistance, high cooling, low Evaporative, long-life integrated water-cooled cooler.

【ARGB God Light Synchronization】 The ARGB of the pwm fan and the water-cooling head is synchronized with the 5V 3pin on the motherboard, 1600W color soft light effect, efficient cooling while providing rich lighting effects (creating a dazzling light world), supporting lighting effects Connect in series to avoid insufficient light slots.

【High-performance cold head】 Using high-quality copper bottom with 0.1mm spacing, plus aluminum alloy cover and high-strength acrylic top cover, using mirror plating and reflection process to create an exclusive pump head, the life of the water-cooling head is up to 40,000 hours, and the speed is up to 5300RPM±10 %, which ensures long-term, excellent cooling of the CPU.

【2 PWM fans】TL-E12B-S balanced fan×2, the speed can reach 2000RPM±10%, the size is 120*120*25mm, the noise is≤27.7DBA, the interface: 4pin PWM, the wind pressure: 2.87mmH2O(MAX), Air volume: 72.37CFM (MAX), S-FDB V2 bearing can solve the problem of fan chattering in hoisting mode, with PWM and ARGB functions, can automatically adjust the speed according to the CPU temperature, can provide strong airflow and lower noise, ARGB Light color can be adjusted manually.

【Compatibility Extensive】Support Intel: LGA 1150/1151/1155/1156/1200/1700/2011/2066; AMD: AM4/AM5/AM2/AM2+/AM3/AM3+/FM1/FM2/FM2+, the cpu water cooler with dual platform full Metal black buckle, easy to install, can be well installed on the corresponding CPU platform, the chassis width is recommended to be greater than 250mm.
body.description: describe:Model: Frozen Notte 240 BLACK ARGBTL-E12B-S fan×2Fan parameters:Fan size 120*120*25mm,Noise≤27.7DBA,Interface: 4pin PWM,Light line interface: 5V 3pin ARGB,Speed: 2000RPM±10%RPM (MAX),Wind pressure: 2.87mmH2O(MAX),Air volume: 72.37CFM (MAX)Pump parameters:Pump noise≤28DBA,Rated current 0.3±10%,Pump power≤1.5W,Pump speed: 5300RPM±10%,Water pump interface: 12V DC/3pin,Pump life 40000hours,Cold head interface: 12V 3pinCold head light interface: 5V 3pin ARGB;Cold row specifications: 277*120*27mmCold head specification: 72*72*54mmWater pipe length: 450mmCold exhaust + fan thickness: 52mmAccessories:240 size radiator x1, TL-E12B-S fan x2, AM4 bracket x1, INTEL115X/17XX backplane x1, black rubber column x4, 20XX stud x4, nut x4, fan Screw x8, drain screw x8, fan Y-type adapter cable x1, manual x1, silicone grease x1, warranty card x1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome AIO that can be mounted to the bottom of your case!
reviews.reviewText: Price to performance is absolutely ridiculous...the cheapest AIO I have seen and some of the best performance I've seen...Only thing I think that may be better for the price is the Deepcool LT520/LS520 series coolers, but it's very, very close.I needed a cooler for this particular build that can be oriented in 2 different ways, one of which and the best orientation for airflow/cooling that would have the radiator mounted at the bottom. For the vast majority of AIOs this is a big no no as air will get caught in the highest point of the loop, which would be in the CPU block where most AIOs also have the Pump installed. This has the pump installed on the tubes close to the radiator making it totally safe for the radiator to be mounted on the bottom. So now , regardless of the orientation of the case, the AIO will work just as good without possibly compromising the pump.All things considered, versatility, performance, price, and looks, this is definitely high up on the list of best overall AIO liquid coolers.The fans come pre-installed on the radiator in exhaust orientation. Installation on AM5 was a breeze and used the clips already present on the motherboard to attach. Radiator mounts the same as any other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth it
reviews.reviewText: This has to be one of the best coolers ever even for the price, this cooler left me shocked at the temps I was getting and it even came with the fans pre installed, most companies like Corsair make you install them your self so this was amazing. Another reason why this cooler is great is the lighting affects it has and they went above and beyond if you have the money, I would get this. I’m shocked and I would recommend it fully to anyone in the market for a cooler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Water Cooler Aio
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very easy to install. Its simply easy convenient priced to sell. The performance compares to asus water cooler without spending asus money. Buy this water cooler and you will thank me later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product.
reviews.reviewText: Looks good. Rgb matched my current setup. Worked well. Running a benchmark I couldn’t get the cpu over 50c.Super quite pump. Bought another one for another pc already

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Installation is a pain
reviews.reviewText: This unit cools well and looks great, but the installation instructions (or lack thereof) are relatively hard to follow. The mounting system was simple enough, but the latch to the AMD mounting bracket was unnecessarily difficult to get attached. Still, a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars CPU temp hit 50 when ideal. Fan noise is very loud
reviews.reviewText: This AIO cooler is easy to install, and the tools included are good enough for a successful installation. However, if the fan can be daisy chained, it would be better. The supplied 4 pins splitter is in BLACK, they should include a white one instead where I ordered a white AIO.It is an interesting AIO, the pump is actually sits on the hose. The mirror RGB looks very nice. However, the fan is so loud since it always goes up to 80%. It is funny that the ideal temp fluctuated from 36-50 with 1-2% CPU usage. So, when it hit 50, the fan starts running. If you set the fan to run at lower speed, the temp will go up to a point that make the fan hit 80% again. Is the AIO working correctly? Yes, it does. I stressed test it with Cinebench. It always stays at 60-61 max. It is very interesting. Or did I do something wrong?BTW, I am using a 5600X.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing cooler for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have installed many coolers from most brands, this install was SUPER easy, the fans are already mounted for you which works in your benefit 90% of the time as fan orienation and direction was right off the bat.The cooler itself feels premium, the colors was great and the cooling was great for the price point and size.would buy again and again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working perfectly and looks amazing
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install and works perfectly. Is performed better than my Corsair h100x rgb and only half price.
He tenido AIOs mas caros, y este sin dudas es lo mejor en refrigeración que he probado, y cuando tomamos en cuenta que es de lo mas económico no hay que dudar en comprarlo.
Es una refrigeracion liquida bastante buena, la calidad se siente bastante aceptable aun por el precio tan bajo. Mi i5-11400F ya no pasa de los 55 grados.
